title: China cuts smog but health damage already done: study
text:
China cuts smog but health damage already done: study 4:31am EDT - 01:51 
While China has made progress cutting smog, the damage to the health of millions of people may already have been done, especially as the population ages, according to a new study. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
While China has made progress cutting smog, the damage to the health of millions of people may already have been done, especially as the population ages, according to a new study.
